  • "components/Text"
  • Text

Class Text

A Text object is used to display text with specified styles like font size, font family, color, etc.

Text in this element can not be wrapped automatically, you must add '\n' by yourself in case of wrapping the text; and Text element can not be 'inline' either, which means text siblings are displayed block by block.

Code example:

const html = "<text style='color:red'>hello</text><text style='color:green'>world</text>";
container.load(html);

Hierarchy

  • XObject
    • Text

    combined matrix.

  • Inherited from Container.localToLocal

    • Defined in components/XObject.ts:385

    Transforms the specified x and y position from the coordinate space of this object to the coordinate space of the target object.

    Parameters

    • x: number

      The x position in the source object to transform.

    • y: number

      The y position on the source object to transform.

    • target: XObject

      The target object to which the coordinates will be transformed.

    Returns Point

    Returns a Point instance with x and y properties correlating to the transformed position in the target's coordinate space.
